issue.title: [C++] Investigate performance of VisitBitsUnrolled on different platforms

### Original Issue Description:
Investigate performance of `VisitBitsUnrolled` utility on different platforms, based on [this thread](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4328#discussion_r292515822)
